attributes.action: Bring in the NICE guideline which states 3 cycles of IVF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the present time there is a postcode lottery throughout the UK regarding NHS funding for IVF. The NICE guideline 2004 states that couple should have 3 cycles of IVF to get the best success, it is now 4 years later and the majority of the UK is not bring in these guidelines that many couples need.
Eastern England will from April be funding 3 cycles of IVF if you meet the criteria .

Lets stop this postcode lottery!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring in the NICE guideline which states 3 cycles of IVF."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19464


Prime Minister's Office
